how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;Journalling;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content);Worldbuilding (e.g. for role-playing games);Narrative fiction writing (either supporting its creation or directly writing in TiddlyWiki)
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: No, but I may export content into other formats and share individual tiddlers, the whole wiki, or an extract of the wiki
putting it all together, what value does: General organized notepad and brainstorming tool
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I have customised TiddlyWiki through options and plugins;I am comfortable using WikiText widgets (e.g. <$transclude>, <$list>...);I am comfortable writing filter expressions
how do you save changes in tiddlywiki?: Single-file wiki with custom saver (e.g. TiddlyPWA, Timimi, tw5-browser-nativesaver);Single-file wiki with TiddlyDesktop
how do you back up/sync changes between: DIY (any other solution);No automatic sync across my devices
as you selected diy, would be grateful f: Simple SFTP link, with manual tracking of the latest version (yes, I could do better, but it's quick and dirty)
what could we do better? prompts for thi: No idea, not long enough in the community
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
